snippet: The State Supreme Court decided Wednesday not to consider an appeal of a case brought by opponents of the state’s $68 billion bullet train project, allowing construction to proceed.
abstract: California State Supreme Court decides not to consider an appeal of a case brought by opponents of the state’s $68 billion bullet train project, allowing construction to proceed.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court decided Wednesday not to consider an appeal of a case brought by opponents of the state’s $68 billion bullet train project, allowing construction to proceed.

headline.main: California: A Victory for Rail Project
headline.print_headline: California: A Victory for Rail Project
